titleStmt.title: A True account of the behaviour and manner of the execution of six persons viz. Henry Cornish and Elizabeth Gaunt condemned for high-treason, Richard Hooker for robbery on the high way, Samuel Presby for robery, Edward Linsey for deserting his colours, Thomas Crompton for murthering Edward Herring, who were executed on Friday the 23th of October, 1685 ...

A True account of the behaviour and manner of the execution of six persons viz. Henry Cornish and Elizabeth Gaunt condemned for high-treason, Richard Hooker for robbery on the high way, Samuel Presby for robery, Edward Linsey for deserting his colours, Thomas Crompton for murthering Edward Herring, who were executed on Friday the 23th of October, 1685 ...

notesStmt.note: "This may be printed, R.L.S. October the 23rd 1685."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
